Column.Name: Parent Structure
Event Log
Import to Column
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( AND( [Import Key] = "id", [Import to Column] = NULL ), "'id' column must have an import target" )

FieldEntry.Formula: IF( [Wizard - Supplier Exists] = TRUE, FALSE, TRUE )

ChangeFieldValues.Description: Set other checkbox to false (only 1 can be ticked)

Binding.Expression: ARRAY( "Authenticate", "Get List and Subcategories", "Get Rfx Details", "Custom Request" )

FieldEntry.Formula: LET $data := ARRAY_FIRST([Suppliers]); LET $allHeadings := HASH_KEYS($data); LET $excludeList := ARRAY( "logoUrl", "supplierList", "supplierListType", "location", "filterTagIds", "supplierListId", "subCategories" ); RETURN ARRAY_WHERE($allHeadings, $(i, item) ARRAY_INDEXOF($excludeList, $item) = NULL)
IF( [Target Form] <> NULL, DB_GETCOLUMNS([Target Form]), ARRAY() )
ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [Import Key], $(i, item) IF( $item = "id", "Supplier List ID", $item = "name", "Supplier List Name" ) )

ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [Import Key], $(i, item) IF( $item = "id", "Supplier ID", $item = "userId", "User ID", $item = "profileId", "Profile ID", $item = "vendorGroupPanelLinkId", "Supplier Group Supplier List Link ID", $item = "businessName", "Supplier Name", $item = "businessNumber", "Business Number", $item = "fullName", "Full Name", $item = "email", "Email" ) )
ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [Import Key], $(i, item) IF( $item = "id", "User ID", $item = "supplierListId", "Supplier List ID" ) )

ChangeFieldValues.Description: CoSR - Supplier List Member Import Settings

FieldEntry.Formula: IF( [Target Form] <> NULL, DB_GETCOLUMNS([Target Form]), ARRAY() )
IF( [Target Form] <> NULL, DB_GETCOLUMNS([Target Form]), ARRAY() )
IF( [Target Form] <> NULL, DB_GETCOLUMNS([Target Form]), ARRAY() )

Binding.Expression: IF( [Target Parent Form] <> NULL, COALESCE( DB_GETCOLUMNS([Target Parent Form]), ARRAY() ), ARRAY() )
AND( [Selected View] = "Get List and Subcategories", [Create Records] = "Subcategory" )

FieldEntry.Formula: IF( [Target Form] <> NULL, DB_GETCOLUMNS([Target Form]), ARRAY() )
IF( [Target Form] <> NULL, DB_GETCOLUMNS([Target Form]), ARRAY() )

Binding.Expression: IF( [Target Parent Form] <> NULL, COALESCE( DB_GETCOLUMNS([Target Parent Form]), ARRAY() ), ARRAY() )
FALSE/*AND( [Selected View] = "Get List and Subcategories", [Create Records] = "Supplier List" )*/
AND( [Selected View] = "Get List and Subcategories", [Create Records] <> NULL )
AND( [Selected View] = "Get List and Subcategories", [Create Records] = "Supplier List" )
AND( [Selected View] = "Get List and Subcategories", [Create Records] <> NULL )

FieldEntry.Formula: IF( [Request URL] = "https://uat-vp-api.vendorpanel.com.au/api/v1/Transactions", HASH_GET(JSONDECODE([Response Body]), "id"), [Custom Transaction ID] )

FormulaCriterion.Formula: AND( [Opportunity ID] <> NULL, ARRAY_LENGTH([Files to Upload]) >0 )

Label.Text: Link Rfx to supplier lists, categories, subcategories

Binding.Expression:
LET $filteredbyList:= ARRAY_WHERE( [Supplier Subcategories], $(i,item) ARRAY_INDEXOF( [Selected List Ids], HASH_GET($item, "listId") )>0 );
RETURN ARRAY_SELECT( $filteredbyList, $(i,item) HASH( "value", HASH( "parentCategoryId", HASH_GET($item, "parentCategoryId"), "subCategoryId", HASH_GET($item, "subCategoryId") ), "text", "Category: "& HASH_GET($item, "parentCategoryName") &" | Subcategory: "& HASH_GET($item, "subCategoryName") ) )

TriggerCustomEvent.EventArgumentsFormula: HASH( "Event", "opportunity creation: "& IF( [Response Code] = "200", "Sucesss 200, opportunityId "& HASH_GET([Temp], "id"), "Error, Response Code: "& [Response Code] & " - "& [Response Body] ) )
HASH( "Event", "transactionId creation: "& IF( [Response Code] = "200", "Sucesss 200, transactionId"& HASH_GET([Temp], "id"), "Error, Response Code: "& [Response Code] ) )

Event.Name: Draft Rfx
Event.Description: 1.gets auth, 2. creates transaction and rfx, 3. uploads file

FormulaCriterion.Formula: AND( [Opportunity ID] <> NULL, ARRAY_LENGTH([Files to Upload]) >0 )

FieldEntry.Formula: HASH( "Opportunity ID", [Opportunity ID], "Last Event", HASH_GET( ARRAY_LAST([Event Log Array]), "Event") )

Event.Name: Get All Responses (Loop for each page)

ChangeFieldValues.Description: Merge page data into main field

TriggerCustomEvent.EventArgumentsFormula: HASH( "Event", "Get all responses: "& IF( [Response Code] = "200", "Sucesss 200 : "& ARRAY_LENGTH([Temp])& " responses found (page" & HASH_GET($eventargs, "loop") & ")", "Error, Response Code: "& [Response Code] ) )

Event.Name: Get and Import
Event.Description: Update or Create: List, Categories, Subcategories, Suppliers, Responses

FormulaCriterion.Formula: OR( ARRAY_INDEXOF( HASH_GET([Request Params], "Import"), "Category" ) > 0, ARRAY_INDEXOF( HASH_GET([Request Params], "Import"), "Subcategory" ) > 0, ARRAY_INDEXOF( HASH_GET([Request Params], "Import"), "Supplier List" ) > 0 )

FieldEntry.Formula: COALESCE( HASH_GET($eventargs, "Run as User"), [Run As User], EBMS_GET_CURRENT_USER() )

TriggerCustomEvent.EventArgumentsFormula: HASH( "Event", "Authenticate as " & [Run As User] & ": " & IF( HASH_GET([API Authentication Result], "BearerToken") <> NULL, "Success", "Fail") )

Event.Name: Get ChannelCode
Event.Description: Grab the Channel Code of the enterprise by first triggering Get Channel ID custom event then using Enterprises/{id} call.

Event.Name: Get ChannelID
Event.Description: Grabs the Channel ID of the enterprise associated to this instance using UserPermissions call.

TriggerCustomEvent.EventArgumentsFormula: HASH( "Event", "Locate document as " & [Run As User] & ": " & IF(HASH_GET([Response Header], "Location") = NULL, "Document not found", "Document found") )

Event.Name: Get Document and Upload to record (GTM)
Get Lists Categories Subcategories
Event.Description: get lists, categories, subcategories for a listType

Event.Name: Get Subcategories for Lists
Event.Description: gets category/subcategory pairs for a set of listIds - param($bearerToken, $listIdsString)

Event.Name: Get Supplier Lists
Event.Description: gets supplier list for specific listType: param($bearerToken, $listType) or all listType if no listType is passed

Event.Name: Get Suppliers
Event.Description: gets suppliers for a specific supplier list/category/subcategory : param($bearerToken, $subcategoryId, $categoryId, $listId)

TriggerCustomEvent.EventArgumentsFormula: HASH( "Event", "Get Suppliers for an Rfx "&HASH_GET($eventargs, "opportunityId")& ": "& IF( [Response Code] = "200", "Sucesss 200 : "& ARRAY_LENGTH([Temp])& " suppliers found for listId "&HASH_GET($eventargs, "listId")& " and categoryId "& HASH_GET($eventargs, "categoryId") & " and subcategoryId "& HASH_GET($eventargs, "subcategoryId"), "Error, Response Code: "& [Response Code] ) )

Event.Name: Get Suppliers for an Rfx
Event.Description: gets supplier lists of ran Rfx - params($opportunityId)

TriggerCustomEvent.EventArgumentsFormula: HASH( "Event", "Get Suppliers for an Rfx "&HASH_GET($eventargs, "opportunityId")& ": "& IF( [Response Code] = "200", "Sucesss 200 : "& ARRAY_LENGTH([Supplier Subcategories])& " subcategories found", "Error, Response Code: "& [Response Code] ) )

LET $data:= ARRAY_INDEX([Supplier Subcategories], $count); RETURN HASH( "listId", HASH_GET($data, "listId"), "categoryId", HASH_GET($data,"categoryId"), "subcategoryId", HASH_GET($data,"subcategoryId"), "line", $count )

FormulaDrivenChangeFieldValues.FieldValuesFormula:
LET $createRecords:= HASH_GET($eventargs, "Create Records"); //potential values - ("Category", "Subcategory", "Supplier List", "Supplier", "Supplier List Child", "Response")
LET $supplierExcludeList := ARRAY( "logoUrl", "supplierList", "supplierListType", "location", "filterTagIds", "supplierListId", "subCategories" );
LET $supplierChildrenIncludeList := ARRAY( //map of form A to Form B "userId", "supplierListId" );
LET $mapping:= HASH( "Category",
HASH_KEYS( HASH_GET( ARRAY_FIRST([Supplier Subcategories]), "parentCategory" ) ),
"Subcategory",
HASH_KEYS( HASH_GET( ARRAY_FIRST([Supplier Subcategories]), "subCategory" ) ),
"Supplier List",
HASH_KEYS( ARRAY_FIRST( HASH_GET( ARRAY_FIRST([Supplier Subcategories]), "supplierLists" ) ) ),
"Supplier",
ARRAY_WHERE( HASH_KEYS(ARRAY_FIRST([Suppliers])), $(i,item) ARRAY_INDEXOF($excludesupplierExcludeListList, $item) = NULL),
"Supplier List Child",
ARRAY_WHERE( HASH_KEYS(ARRAY_FIRST([Suppliers])), $(i,item) ARRAY_INDEXOF($supplierChildrenIncludeList, $item) > 0 ),
"Response", NULL
);
RETURN HASH( "Create Records", ARRAY($createRecords), "Import Key", HASH_GET($mapping, $createRecords),
//clear these "Target Form", ARRAY(NULL), "Target Parent Form", ARRAY(NULL), "Parent Form ID Column", ARRAY(NULL) )

TriggerCustomEvent.Description: Sync Data via Relationships (for Supplier list children)

TriggerCustomEvent.EventArgumentsFormula:
HASH( "selectedLists", HASH_GET([Request Params], "selectedLists"), "opportunityId", [Opportunity ID], "listType", HASH_GET([Request Params], "listType")
)

HASH( "Event", "link Rfx to Supplier Subcategories: "& IF( [Response Code] = "200", "Sucesss 200, opportunityId "& [Opportunity ID], "Error, Response Code: "& [Response Code]& " - "& HASH_GET(JSONDECODE([Response Body]), "message") ) )

HASH( "Event", "link Rfx to SupplierLists: "& IF( [Response Code] = "200", "Sucesss 200, opportunityId "& [Opportunity ID], "Error, Response Code: "& [Response Code]& " - "& HASH_GET(JSONDECODE([Response Body]), "message") ) )

HASH( "Event", "link Rfx to Suppliers: "& IF( [Response Code] = "200", "Sucesss 200, opportunityId "& [Opportunity ID], "Error, Response Code: "& [Response Code]& " - "& HASH_GET(JSONDECODE([Response Body]), "message") ) )

TriggerCustomEvent.Description: Get Rfx -- required to get ETag

TriggerCustomEvent.EventArgumentsFormula: HASH( "Event", "link Rfx to Suppliers: "& IF( [Response Code] = "200", "Sucesss 200, opportunityId "& [Opportunity ID], "Error, Response Code: "& [Response Code]& " - "& HASH_GET(JSONDECODE([Response Body]), "message") ) )

FieldEntry.Formula: HASH( "Opportunity ID", [Opportunity ID], "Last Event", HASH_GET( ARRAY_LAST([Event Log Array]), "Event"), "Responses", [Responses] )

LET $addition := ARRAY( HASH( "Event", HASH_GET($eventargs, "Event"), "DateTime", NOW(), "User", EBMS_GET_CURRENT_USER(), "Actual User", EBMS_GET_CURRENT_ACTUAL_USER() ) );
RETURN IF( [Event Log Array] <> NULL,
ARRAY_CONCAT( [Event Log Array], $addition ),
$addition )

TriggerCustomEvent.EventArgumentsFormula: HASH( "Event", "upload file to opportunityId: "& HASH_GET($eventargs, "opportunityId")&" "& IF( [Response Code] = "201", "Sucesss 201,", "Error, Response Code: "& [Response Code] ) & " filename: "& HASH_GET($eventargs, "filename") )

HASH( "Event", "upload file to opportunityId: "& HASH_GET($eventargs, "opportunityId")&" "& IF( [Response Code] = "201", "Sucesss 201,", "Error, Response Code: "& [Response Code] ) & " filename: "& HASH_GET($eventargs, "filename") )
